exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);

    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

type expr =

    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with 
    | VarX -> "x"
    | VarY -> "y"
    | Sine var1 -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString var1 ^ ")"
    | Cosine var2 -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString var2 ^ ")"
    | Average (var3, var4) -> "((" ^ exprToString var3 ^ "+" ^ exprToString var4 ^ ")/2)"
    | Times (var5, var6) -> exprToString var5 ^ "*" ^ exprToString var6
    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> "(" ^ exprToString var7 ^ "<" ^ exprToString var8 ^ "?" ^ exprToString var9 ^ ":" ^ exprToString var0 ^ ")"

let buildX()                       = VarX

let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
  match e with 
    | VarX -> x
    | VarY -> y
    | Sine var1 -> sin(pi*(eval(var1, x, y)))
    | Cosine var2 -> cos(pi*(eval(var2, x, y)))
    | Average (var3, var4) -> (((eval(var3, x, y) + eval(var4, x, y)))/2)
    | Times (var5, var6) -> (eval(var5, x, y))*(eval(var6, x, y))
    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> (eval(var7, x, y) < (eval(var8, x, y)) ? (eval(var9, x, y)) : (eval(var0, x, y)))

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm")) 

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let g = makeRand (seed1,seed2) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =

  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with 
    | VarX -> "x"
    | VarY -> "y"
    | Sine var1 -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString var1 ^ ")"
    | Cosine var2 -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString var2 ^ ")"
    | Average (var3, var4) -> "((" ^ exprToString var3 ^ "+" ^ exprToString var4 ^ ")/2)"
    | Times (var5, var6) -> exprToString var5 ^ "*" ^ exprToString var6
    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> "(" ^ exprToString var7 ^ "<" ^ exprToString var8 ^ "?" ^ exprToString var9 ^ ":" ^ exprToString var0 ^ ")"

let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
  match e with 
    | VarX -> x
    | VarY -> y
    | Sine var1 -> sin(pi*(eval(var1, x, y)))
    | Cosine var2 -> cos(pi*(eval(var2, x, y)))
    | Average (var3, var4) -> (((eval(var3, x, y) + eval(var4, x, y)))/2)
    | Times (var5, var6) -> (eval(var5, x, y))*(eval(var6, x, y))
    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> if ((eval(var7, x, y) < (eval(var8, x, y))) then (eval(var9, x, y)) else (eval(var0, x, y)))

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) then seen (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            else [h]@seen in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
          let rest' = t in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) then seen (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            else [h]@seen in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
          let rest' = t in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) then seen (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            else [h]@seen in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
          let rest' = t in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let _ =

            helper (seen',rest')

    List.rev (helper ([],l))

    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) then seen (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            else [h]@seen in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
          let rest' = t in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with 
    | VarX -> "x"
    | VarY -> "y"
    | Sine var1 -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString var1 ^ ")"
    | Cosine var2 -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString var2 ^ ")"
    | Average (var3, var4) -> "((" ^ exprToString var3 ^ "+" ^ exprToString var4 ^ ")/2)"
    | Times (var5, var6) -> exprToString var5 ^ "*" ^ exprToString var6
    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> "(" ^ exprToString var7 ^ "<" ^ exprToString var8 ^ "?" ^ exprToString var9 ^ ":" ^ exprToString var0 ^ ")"

    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> if (eval(var7, x, y) < (eval(var8, x, y))) then (eval(var9, x, y)) else (eval(var0, x, y))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  match (f b) with
    | (newB, false) -> newB (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
    | (newB, true) -> wwhile(f, newB);;

type expr = 
      VarX
    | VarY
    | Sine     of expr
    | Cosine   of expr
    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr	

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)
let rec exprToString e =
  match e with 
    | VarX -> "x"
    | VarY -> "y"
    | Sine var1 -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString var1 ^ ")"
    | Cosine var2 -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString var2 ^ ")"
    | Average (var3, var4) -> "((" ^ exprToString var3 ^ "+" ^ exprToString var4 ^ ")/2)"
    | Times (var5, var6) -> exprToString var5 ^ "*" ^ exprToString var6
    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> "(" ^ exprToString var7 ^ "<" ^ exprToString var8 ^ "?" ^ exprToString var9 ^ ":" ^ exprToString var0 ^ ")"


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let buildX()                       = VarX
let buildY()                       = VarY
let buildSine(e)                   = Sine(e)
let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
  match e with 
    | VarX -> x
    | VarY -> y
    | Sine var1 -> sin(pi*.(eval(var1, x, y)))
    | Cosine var2 -> cos(pi*.(eval(var2, x, y)))
    | Average (var3, var4) -> .((.(eval(var3, x, y)) + (.eval(var4, x, y)))/2)
    | Times (var5, var6) -> (eval(var5, x, y))*(eval(var6, x, y))
    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> if (eval(var7, x, y) < (eval(var8, x, y))) then (eval(var9, x, y)) else (eval(var0, x, y))


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
*)


let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))


(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm")) 

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let g = makeRand (seed1,seed2) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let rec append_new xs1 xs2= 
  match xs1 with
      [] -> xs2
    | head::tail -> head::(append_new tail xs2) ;;


let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with 
    | [] -> d
    | (ki, vi)::tail -> if (k = ki) then vi
        else assoc (d, k, tail);;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) then seen (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            else [h]@seen in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
          let rest' = t in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
  match e with 
    | VarX -> x
    | VarY -> y
    | Sine var1 -> sin(pi*.(eval(var1, x, y)))
    | Cosine var2 -> cos(pi*.(eval(var2, x, y)))
    | Average (var3, var4) -> (.(eval(var3, x, y)) + eval(var4, x, y))/2
    | Times (var5, var6) -> (eval(var5, x, y))*(eval(var6, x, y))
    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> if (eval(var7, x, y) < (eval(var8, x, y))) then (eval(var9, x, y)) else (eval(var0, x, y))

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let g = makeRand (seed1,seed2) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let rec append_new xs1 xs2= 
  match xs1 with
      [] -> xs2
    | head::tail -> head::(append_new tail xs2) ;;


let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with 
    | [] -> d
    | (ki, vi)::tail -> if (k = ki) then vi
        else assoc (d, k, tail);;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) then seen (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            else [h]@seen in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
          let rest' = t in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

    | (newB, false) -> newB (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
    | (newB, true) -> wwhile(f, newB);;

    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with 
    | VarX -> "x"
    | VarY -> "y"
    | Sine var1 -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString var1 ^ ")"
    | Cosine var2 -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString var2 ^ ")"
    | Average (var3, var4) -> "((" ^ exprToString var3 ^ "+" ^ exprToString var4 ^ ")/2)"
    | Times (var5, var6) -> exprToString var5 ^ "*" ^ exprToString var6
    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> "(" ^ exprToString var7 ^ "<" ^ exprToString var8 ^ "?" ^ exprToString var9 ^ ":" ^ exprToString var0 ^ ")"

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toReal (i,n) = (float_of_int i) /. (float_of_int n)

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let g = makeRand (seed1,seed2) in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) then seen (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            else [h]@seen in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
          let rest' = t in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with 
    | VarX -> "x"
    | VarY -> "y"
    | Sine var1 -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString var1 ^ ")"
    | Cosine var2 -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString var2 ^ ")"
    | Average (var3, var4) -> "((" ^ exprToString var3 ^ "+" ^ exprToString var4 ^ ")/2)"
    | Times (var5, var6) -> exprToString var5 ^ "*" ^ exprToString var6
    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> "(" ^ exprToString var7 ^ "<" ^ exprToString var8 ^ "?" ^ exprToString var9 ^ ":" ^ exprToString var0 ^ ")"

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let e1 = build (g, depth) in
  let e2 = build (g, depth) in
  let e3 = build (g, depth) in

  let _ = Format.printf "red   = %s \n" (exprToString e1) in
  let _ = Format.printf "green = %s \n" (exprToString e2) in
  let _ = Format.printf "blue  = %s \n" (exprToString e3) in

  let f1 = eval_fn e1 in
  let f2 = eval_fn e2 in
  let f3 = eval_fn e3 in

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name)

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 assoc
                 (-1, "william", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 23
                 "sample: assoc 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 assoc
                 (-1, "bob", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 (-1)
                 "sample: assoc 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;6;2;4;12;2;13;6;9]

    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;1;1]
                 [1]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 wwhile 
                 ((fun x -> let xx = x*x*x in (xx, xx < 100)), 2) 
                 512 
                 "sample: wwhile 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 fixpoint
                 ((fun x -> truncate (1e6 *. cos (1e-6 *. float x))), 0)
                 739085
                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr2, 150,"sample2")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 2: manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g1 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 1 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g2 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 2 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g3 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 3 : manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c1 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: color 1 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c2 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: color 2 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c3 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: color 3 : manual"
    )] 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

ocaml.min:
type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr;;

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine var1 -> sin (pi *. (eval (var1, x, y)))
  | Cosine var2 -> cos (pi *. (eval (var2, x, y)))
  | Average (var3,var4) ->
      ((eval (var3, x, y)) +. (eval (var4, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (var5,var6) -> (eval (var5, x, y)) *. (eval (var6, x, y))
  | Thresh (var7,var8,var9,var0) ->
      if (eval (var7, x, y)) < (eval (var8, x, y))
      then eval (var9, x, y)
      else eval (var0, x, y);;

let rec append_new xs1 xs2= 
  match xs1 with
      [] -> xs2
    | head::tail -> head::(append_new tail xs2) ;;


let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with 
    | [] -> d
    | (ki, vi)::tail -> if (k = ki) then vi
        else assoc (d, k, tail);;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) then seen (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            else [h]@seen in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
          let rest' = t in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  match (f b) with
    | (newB, false) -> newB (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
    | (newB, true) -> wwhile(f, newB);;

type expr =

    | Average  of expr * expr
    | Times    of expr * expr
    | Thresh   of expr * expr * expr * expr

let rec exprToString e =
  match e with 
    | VarX -> "x"
    | VarY -> "y"
    | Sine var1 -> "sin(pi*" ^ exprToString var1 ^ ")"
    | Cosine var2 -> "cos(pi*" ^ exprToString var2 ^ ")"
    | Average (var3, var4) -> "((" ^ exprToString var3 ^ "+" ^ exprToString var4 ^ ")/2)"
    | Times (var5, var6) -> exprToString var5 ^ "*" ^ exprToString var6
    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> "(" ^ exprToString var7 ^ "<" ^ exprToString var8 ^ "?" ^ exprToString var9 ^ ":" ^ exprToString var0 ^ ")"

let buildCosine(e)                 = Cosine(e)
let buildAverage(e1,e2)            = Average(e1,e2)
let buildTimes(e1,e2)              = Times(e1,e2)
let buildThresh(a,b,a_less,b_less) = Thresh(a,b,a_less,b_less)


let pi = 4.0 *. atan 1.0

let rec eval (e,x,y) = 
  match e with 
    | VarX -> x
    | VarY -> y
    | Sine var1 -> sin(pi*.(eval(var1, x, y)))
    | Cosine var2 -> cos(pi*.(eval(var2, x, y)))
    | Average (var3, var4) -> ((eval(var3, x, y)) +.eval(var4, x, y))/.2.0
    | Times (var5, var6) -> (eval(var5, x, y))*.(eval(var6, x, y))
    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> if (eval(var7, x, y) < (eval(var8, x, y))) then (eval(var9, x, y)) else (eval(var0, x, y))

let eval_fn e (x,y) = 
  let rv = eval (e,x,y) in
    assert (-1.0 <= rv && rv <= 1.0);
    rv

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) = 
  let seed = (Array.of_list [seed1;seed2]) in
  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =
  if n <= 0 then [] else (g r)::(rseq g r (n-1))

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  let _ = print_string (exprToString e) in
  let f = eval_fn e in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n = 150 in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let name = Format.sprintf "%d_%d_%d" depth seed1 seed2 in
    emitGrayscale (f,n,name)

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_c_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".ppm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P6 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let doRandomColor (depth,seed1,seed2) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

type test = unit -> string

let key = "" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130 = "130" (*XXXXXXXX*)
let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
let explode s = 
  let rec _exp i = 
    if i >= String.length s then [] else (s.[i])::(_exp (i+1)) in
    _exp 0

let implode cs = 
  String.concat "" (List.map (String.make 1) cs)

let drop_paren s = 
  implode (List.filter (fun c -> not (List.mem c ['(';' ';')'])) (explode s))

let eq_real p (r1,r2) = 
  (r1 -. r2) < p || (r2 -. r1) < p

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest

                 "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

type expr =
  | VarX
  | VarY
  | Sine of expr
  | Cosine of expr
  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr
  | Thresh of expr* expr* expr* expr;;

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine var1 -> sin (pi *. (eval (var1, x, y)))
  | Cosine var2 -> cos (pi *. (eval (var2, x, y)))
  | Average (var3,var4) ->
      ((eval (var3, x, y)) +. (eval (var4, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (var5,var6) -> (eval (var5, x, y)) *. (eval (var6, x, y))
  | Thresh (var7,var8,var9,var0) ->
      if (eval (var7, x, y)) < (eval (var8, x, y))
      then eval (var9, x, y)
      else eval (var0, x, y);;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) then seen (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            else [h]@seen in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
          let rest' = t in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

let rec wwhile (f,b) =

    | Thresh (var7, var8, var9, var0) -> "(" ^ exprToString var7 ^ "<" ^ exprToString var8 ^ "?" ^ exprToString var9 ^ ":" ^ exprToString var0 ^ ")"

let makeRand (seed1, seed2) =

  let s = Random.State.make seed in
    (fun (x,y) -> (x + (Random.State.int s (y-x))))


let rec rseq g r n =

let toIntensity z = int_of_float (127.5 +. (127.5 *. z))

let rec ffor (low,high,f) = 
  if low > high then () else 
    let _ = f low in 
      ffor (low+1,high,f)

let emitGrayscale (f,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let fname  = ("art_g_"^name) in
  let chan = open_out (fname^".pgm") in
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
  let n2p1 = n*2+1 in   
  let _ = output_string chan (Format.sprintf "P5 %d %d 255\n" n2p1 n2p1) in
  let _ = 
    ffor (-n, n, 
          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z = f (x,y) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz = toIntensity(z) in
                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz))) in 
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".pgm "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".pgm"))

let emitColor (f1,f2,f3,n,name) =
  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

  let _ =

          fun ix ->
            ffor (-n, n, 
                  fun iy ->
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let x = toReal(ix,n) in
                    let y = toReal(iy,n) in
                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let z1 = f1 (x,y) in
                    let z2 = f2 (x,y) in
                    let z3 = f3 (x,y) in

                    (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                    let iz1 = toIntensity(z1) in
                    let iz2 = toIntensity(z2) in
                    let iz3 = toIntensity(z3) in

                      (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz1);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz2);
                      output_char chan (char_of_int iz3);
                 )) in  
    close_out chan;
    ignore(Sys.command ("convert "^fname^".ppm  "^fname^".jpg"));
    ignore(Sys.command ("rm "^fname^".ppm"))

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) =

let testTest () =

  let testBad x = 0 in

    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&

    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let eq_real p (r1,r2) =

  Format.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 assoc
                 (-1, "william", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 23
                 "sample: assoc 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 assoc
                 (-1, "bob", [("ranjit",85);("william",23);("moose",44)])
                 (-1)
                 "sample: assoc 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;6;2;4;12;2;13;6;9]
                 [1;6;2;4;12;13;9]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 removeDuplicates
                 [1;1;1]
                 [1]
                 "sample: removeDuplicates 2"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 wwhile 
                 ((fun x -> let xx = x*x*x in (xx, xx < 100)), 2) 
                 512 
                 "sample: wwhile 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 fixpoint
                 ((fun x -> truncate (1e6 *. cos (1e-6 *. float x))), 0)
                 739085
                 "sample: fixpoint 1"
    ); 

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr, 150,"sample")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 1: manual"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 emitGrayscale
                 (eval_fn sampleExpr2, 150,"sample2")
                 ()
                 "sample: eval_fn 2: manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g1 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 1 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g2 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 2 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomGray (g3 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: gray 3 : manual"
    );

    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c1 ()))

                 ()
                 "sample: color 1 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c2 ()))
                 ()
                 ()
                 "sample: color 2 : manual"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 (fun () -> doRandomColor (c3 ()))

                 ()
                 "sample: color 3 : manual"
    )] 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Format.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest sampleTests                in
  let _      = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _      = print130 ("Compiled\n")                    in
    (!score, !max)

  | Average of expr* expr
  | Times of expr* expr

let pi = 4.0 *. (atan 1.0);;

let rec eval (e,x,y) =
  match e with
  | VarX  -> x
  | VarY  -> y
  | Sine var1 -> sin (pi *. (eval (var1, x, y)))
  | Cosine var2 -> cos (pi *. (eval (var2, x, y)))
  | Average (var3,var4) ->
      ((eval (var3, x, y)) +. (eval (var4, x, y))) /. 2.0
  | Times (var5,var6) -> (eval (var5, x, y)) *. (eval (var6, x, y))

      if (eval (var7, x, y)) < (eval (var8, x, y))
      then eval (var9, x, y)
      else eval (var0, x, y);;

let rec append_new xs1 xs2= 
  match xs1 with
      [] -> xs2
    | head::tail -> head::(append_new tail xs2) ;;


let rec assoc (d,k,l) = 
  match l with 
    | [] -> d
    | (ki, vi)::tail -> if (k = ki) then vi
        else assoc (d, k, tail);;

let removeDuplicates l = 
  let rec helper (seen,rest) = 
    match rest with 
        [] -> seen
      | h::t -> 
          let seen' = if (List.mem h seen) then seen (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            else [h]@seen in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
          let rest' = t in (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
            helper (seen',rest') 
  in
    List.rev (helper ([],l))

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let rec wwhile (f,b) = 
  match (f b) with
    | (newB, false) -> newB (*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
    | (newB, true) -> wwhile(f, newB);;
